subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Tom Durkin, who has called the Kentucky Derby 13 times, said he did not renew his contract with NBC because of the anxiety the race had caused.
snippet: Tom Durkin, who has called the Kentucky Derby 13 times, said he did not renew his contract with NBC because of the anxiety the race had caused.
